*{{WPLink|Banana_Pi}} *[http://wiki.banana-pi.org/Banana_Pi_BPI-R1 ''Banana Pi R1'' on '''Banana Pi''' Wiki] *[http://wiki.lemaker.org/Main_Boards ''Banana Pi'' on '''LeMaker''' Wiki] *[http://www.cnx-software.com/2016/04/02/low-cost-development-boards-linux-benchmarks-raspberry-pi-vs-banana-pi-vs-orange-pi-vs-odroid/ ''Banana Pi'' on '''CNX|Software''']
{{WikiDevi.Wi-Cat.RU:Network/Banana Pi models}}
===See also=== *[[Banana Pi BPI R1]] - ''Allwinner'' A20 2-cores ARM (Cortex-A7) CPU @1.0GHz *[[Banana Pi BPI Pro]] - ''Allwinner'' A20 2-cores ARM (Cortex-A7) CPU @1.0GHz :1x GbE (RJ45), WiFi: 802.11bgn (AP6181), 2x USB 2.0 host, 1x USB 2.0 (OTG) *[[Banana Pi BPI M1]] - ''Allwinner'' A20 2-cores ARM (Cortex-A7) CPU @1.0GHz *[[Banana Pi BPI M1+]] - ''Allwinner'' A20 2-cores ARM (Cortex-A7) CPU @1.0GHz *[[Banana Pi BPI M3]] - ''Allwinner'' A83T 8-cores ARM (Cortex-A7) CPU @1.8GHz :GbE switch ([[Realtek]] RTL8211E/D) + WiFi 802.11bgn (AP6212) + BT 4.0 *[[Banana Pi BPI M64]] - ''Allwinner'' A64 Quad Core ARM (Cortex-A53) CPU @1.2GHz :RAM: 2GB (DDR3), 8GB eMMC, GbE LAN, Wi-Fi (AP6212), BT, 2x USB 2.0, 1x HDMI *[[Banana Pi BPI G1]] - MCU: STM32F103CB ARM (Cortex-M3) 32-bit RISC core :WiFi: [[TI]] CC3200 ARM (Cortex-M4) WiSoC, BT: [[TI]] CC2540, ZigBee: [[TI]] CC2530 *[[Banana Pi BPI D1]] - CPU: ''Anyka'' AK3918 (ARM986EJ) 32-bit RISC @400MHz *[[Banana Pi BPI F2]] (08/2018) - [[Freescale (NXP)]] i.MX6 ARM (Cortex-A9) :CPU: 4x MPCore (w/ TrustZone); Memory: 2GB; Storage: 8GB (eMMC) :GPU: OpenGL ES 2.0; 1x Mini PCIe, 3x USB 2.0, 1x SATA, 1x GbE *[[Banana Pi BPI W2]] - [[Realtek]] RTD1296 Quad-core ARM (Cortex-A53) CPU @1.5GHz :GPU: Mali-T820 MP3, RAM: 2GB (DDR4), Flash: 8GB (eMMC), 2x GbE LAN, 2x SATA
